        public int compareTo(Ingredient t)
        Implements abstract method for Comparable
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Ingredient>
        Parameters:
        t - Ingredient object to compare to
        Returns:
        -1 if this.name sorts before t.name, 0 if this.name == t.name and 1 if this.name sorts after t.name
